data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Throw-in Nagoya.
In the minute 1, Hiroyoshi Takayama signals a Kawasaki throw-in in Nagoya's half.
Hiroyoshi Takayama awards Nagoya a goal kick.
Ball safe as Nagoya is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 3, Kawasaki's Shogo Taniguchi gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Nagoya at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
Throw-in for Kawasaki in their own half.
In the minute 4, Hiroyoshi Takayama signals a free kick to Kawasaki in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Kawasaki, Kawasaki push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 8, Kawasaki drive upfield and Leandro Damiao gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Nagoya defender.
Ball goes out of play for a Nagoya goal kick.
Kawasaki have been awarded a corner by Hiroyoshi Takayama.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Kawasaki at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
In Kawasaki, Hidemasa Morita of Kawasaki is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
In the minute 11, In Kawasaki, Jesiel (Kawasaki) misses the target with a header.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kawasaki.
Nagoya awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 13, Nagoya are pushing forward but Naoki Maeda's finish is wide of the goal.
Kawasaki have a goal kick.
Kawasaki to take a throw-in in Nagoya territory.
In the minute 16, Hiroyoshi Takayama signals a free kick to Nagoya.
Corner awarded to Nagoya.
Takuji Yonemoto for Nagoya gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 21, Goal kick for Kawasaki at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
Throw-in for Nagoya in the half of Kawasaki.
Kawasaki have a goal kick.
In the minute 22, Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
Hiroyoshi Takayama waits before resuming play because Yuichi Maruyama for Nagoya is still down.
Yuichi Maruyama returns to the field for Nagoya after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 26, Free kick for Kawasaki in the half of Nagoya.
In Kawasaki a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Can Nagoya get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kawasaki's half?
In the minute 28, Nagoya have been awarded a corner by Hiroyoshi Takayama.
Mu Kanazaki (Nagoya) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Important block from the Kawasaki defence as Mu Kanazaki fires in a strike for Nagoya.
In the minute 29, Nagoya push forward at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium and Mu Kanazaki gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Kawasaki defence.
Hiroyoshi Takayama awards the home team a throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kawasaki.
In the minute 30, In Kawasaki Nagoya attack through Mateus. The finish is off target, however.
Hiroyoshi Takayama awards Kawasaki a goal kick.
Hiroyoshi Takayama signals a Nagoya throw-in in Kawasaki's half.
In the minute 32, Can Nagoya capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kawasaki's half?
Kawasaki's Ao Tanaka gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Nagoya defender.
Kawasaki drives forward and Miki Yamane gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 38, Kawasaki's Ao Tanaka breaks free at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Nagoya goal kick.
Nagoya awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 41, Kawasaki's Miki Yamane is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
Kawasaki attack but Hidemasa Morita's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 42, Hiroyoshi Takayama awards Nagoya a goal kick.
Kawasaki have been awarded a corner by Hiroyoshi Takayama.
Kawasaki take a 1-0 lead thanks to Kaoru Mitoma.
In the minute 44, Shogo Taniguchi instrumental with a fine assist.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
In the minute 45, Nagoya awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The first half has been concluded at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
The second-half is underway in Kawasaki.
In the minute 46, Nagoya awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Kawasaki in the half of Nagoya.
Kawasaki have been awarded a corner by Hiroyoshi Takayama.
In the minute 50, Shogo Taniguchi (Kawasaki) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Ball goes out of play for a Nagoya goal kick.
Free kick Nagoya.
In the minute 52, Nagoya's Mateus breaks free at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kawasaki.
Throw-in for Kawasaki at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
In the minute 54, Throw-in high up the field for Nagoya in Kawasaki.
Kawasaki have a goal kick.
In Kawasaki, Hiroyuki Abe of Nagoya is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 56, Free kick Kawasaki.
Shinnosuke Nakatani scores an unfortunate own goal. This makes it 2-0 at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
Kawasaki's Ao Tanaka misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 59, Goal kick for Nagoya at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
Ao Tanaka for Kawasaki gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Nagoya goal kick.
In the minute 62, In Kawasaki a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Kawasaki's Kaoru Mitoma gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Nagoya defender.
Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
Massimo Ficcadenti (Nagoya) is making a first substitution, with Ryotaro Ishida replacing Naoki Maeda.
In the minute 65, Massimo Ficcadenti is making the team's second substitution at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium with Ryogo Yamasaki replacing Hiroyuki Abe.
Kawasaki move into a 3-0 lead through a Jesiel header.
In the minute 65, Great play from Kengo Nakamura to set up the goal.
Hiroyuki Abe (Nagoya) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Throw-in for Nagoya close to the penalty box.
In the minute 68, Hiroyoshi Takayama awards Kawasaki a goal kick.
Yasuto Wakizaka is replacing Kengo Nakamura for Kawasaki at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
In Kawasaki Nagoya attack through Mateus. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 72, Goal kick for Kawasaki at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
Ryotaro Ishida of Nagoya gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kawasaki.
In the minute 75, Hiroyoshi Takayama signals a free kick to Nagoya in their own half.
Kawasaki have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Nagoya is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 79, Ryotaro Ishida (Nagoya) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Hiroyoshi Takayama awards Kawasaki a goal kick.
Throw-in for Kawasaki in their own half.
In the minute 81, Kawasaki awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kawasaki push upfield but Hiroyoshi Takayama quickly pulls them for offside.
The away team have replaced Oh Jae-suk with Kosuke Ota. This is the third substitution made today by Massimo Ficcadenti.
In the minute 82, Massimo Ficcadenti (Nagoya) is making a fourth substitution, with Joao Schmidt replacing Takuji Yonemoto.
Free kick for Kawasaki in their own half.
At Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium, Kawasaki are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 84, Nagoya are in shooting range from this free kick.
Nagoya are coming forward and Mateus gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Kawasaki at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
In the minute 87, Nagoya pushes forward through Mateus, whose finish on goal is saved.
Nagoya drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Kawasaki make their second substitution with Shintaro Kurumaya replacing Kyohei Noborizato.
In the minute 87, Toru Oniki is making the team's third substitution at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium with Manabu Saito replacing Kaoru Mitoma.
Hiroyoshi Takayama signals a free kick to Nagoya in their own half.
Yasuto Wakizaka gets his shot on target but fails to score for Kawasaki.
Hiroyoshi Takayama signals a free kick to Kawasaki in their own half.
At Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Kawasaki push forward at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium and Ao Tanaka gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Nagoya defence.
Full-time! The final score is 3-0.
Nagoya's Mu Kanazaki has been booked in Kawasaki.
The home team have replaced Leandro Damiao with Kazuya Yamamura. This is the fourth substitution made today by Toru Oniki.
Reo Hatate is on a sub for Akihiro Ienaga for Kawasaki.
